page.title: 18A Day in the life of.....
page.content:
to go home and feed my black and brown rabbits. I do my Maths homework and then it's dinner time - boiled potatoes,roast pork and peas.Nicola comes round and we go out to play for half-an-hour.At 7pm I come in for a bath.Bedtime is 8pm.and I read six pages of the Bible before going to sleep. Elaine Martin, aged 10.
On Saturdays I wake up about 7.30,get up and let the dog out. Then I sit with my pet rats for half an hour, then switch the T.V.on. My brother gets up, then my Mum and she makes breakfast.I go out and find something to do until dinner time.In the afternoon I ride on my mo-ped, and then do anything until tea time.Then I go out or sit in and watch T.V.,then about 10.30 I go to bed and read. Carl Ward, aged 10.
